sourcesContent:
import { React } from 'react'; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const ManageRestaurants = () => { const { restaurants } = useSelector(state => ({ ...state })); const handleRoute = () => { } return (

Manage Restaurants

{restaurants?.length > 0 ? restaurants.map(restaurant =>
handleRoute(restaurant?._id)}>

{restaurant?.restaurantName}

{restaurant?.contact}
{restaurant?.email} {restaurant?.restaurantAddress}, {restaurant?.city}, {restaurant?.state}, {restaurant?.zipCode}
) :
No Requests
}
) } export default ManageRestaurants;
